div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2351 Purmany, Ibiza, before 1906 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 11+ AE. From necropolis Ebusus: 1 (as Vives, MH, pl. 11, 12) 1 (as pl. 12) 3 (as pl. 53) 3 (as pl. 124, 1) Disposition: unknown Roman y Calvet, IPyth, p. 28, illus.
